alert.note: Alert for Cheyenne; Decatur; Gove; Graham; Logan; Norton; Rawlins; Sheridan; Thomas (Kansas) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Goodland (Northwestern Kansas and East Central Colorado)
info.headline: Red Flag Warning issued April 06 at 2:12PM CDT until April 07 at 8:00PM CDT by NWS Goodland
info.description: ...Dangerous fire weather conditions are expected across the entire Tri State area Friday afternoon into the early evening hours... .With a low pressure system west of the region, and high pressure to the east, a strong south-southwesterly downslope wind will develop over the area by the afternoon. This will result in extensive drying of the airmass and further dry out area fuels. ...RED FLAG WARNING IN EFFECT FROM NOON MDT /1 PM CDT/ TO 7 PM MDT /8 PM CDT/ FRIDAY FOR WIND AND LOW RELATIVE HUMIDITY FOR FIRE WEATHER ZONES 001, 002, 003, 004, 014, 015, 016, 028, 029, 079, 080, 081, AND 252... The National Weather Service in Goodland has issued a Red Flag Warning for wind and low relative humidity, which is in effect from noon MDT /1 PM CDT/ to 7 PM MDT /8 PM CDT/ Friday. * Affected Area...In Colorado, Fire Weather Zone 252 Yuma. In Kansas, Fire Weather Zone 001 Cheyenne, Fire Weather Zone 002 Rawlins, Fire Weather Zone 003 Decatur, Fire Weather Zone 004 Norton, Fire Weather Zone 014 Thomas, Fire Weather Zone 015 Sheridan, Fire Weather Zone 016 Graham, Fire Weather Zone 028 Logan and Fire Weather Zone 029 Gove. In Nebraska, Fire Weather Zone 079 Dundy, Fire Weather Zone 080 Hitchcock and Fire Weather Zone 081 Red Willow. * Winds...South-southwest 20 to 30 mph with gusts up to 45 mph. * Relative Humidity...As low as 12 percent. * Impacts...Any fires that start will have extreme fire behavior and spread rapidly. Outdoor burning is not advised.
info.instruction: A Red Flag Warning means that critical fire weather conditions are either occurring now...or are imminent. A combination of strong winds...low relative humidity...and warm temperatures can contribute to extreme fire behavior.

area.areaDesc: Cheyenne; Decatur; Gove; Graham; Logan; Norton; Rawlins; Sheridan; Thomas
